message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DURATION
message.locale: An assessment must have an associated product delivery.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_PRODUCTDELIVERY
message.locale: An assessment can have only one associated product delivery.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_CASEID
message.locale: CaseID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_REASONCODE
message.locale: A reason must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPEALDECISIONDATE
message.locale: Appeal decision date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPEALRECEIPTDATE
message.locale: A receipt date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: A method of receipt must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPEALTYPE
message.locale: An appeal type must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPELLANTTYPE
message.locale: An appellant type must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTRECEIPTDATEINVALID
message.locale: This statement has been recorded but cannot be considered at the hearing as it was received less than %1s days before the scheduled date of the hearing.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTCASESTATUSINVALID
message.locale: Appeal case status must be "open", "active" or "approved".

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTDESCRIPTIONMISSING
message.locale: Description for statement must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTRECEIPTDATEMISSING
message.locale: Date on which statement received by organization must be specified.
Date on which statement received by organisation must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTDOCUMENTMISSING
message.locale: File location and reference number must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTCASEPARTICIPANTMISSING
message.locale: Statement submitter must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_WITNESSSTATEMENT_ONLYFOR_SCHEDULED_HEARING
message.locale: Witness can submit a Statement only for a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTCASEPARTICIPANTINVALID
message.locale: Submitter must be an active case participant for the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_STATEMENTCASEPARTICIPANTINVALIDTYPE
message.locale: Only an appellant, respondent, third party or witness can submit a statement.

message.name: INV_APPEAL_STATEMENTLETTERTASKSUBJECT
message.locale: New statement letter.

message.name: INV_APPEAL_STATEMENTLETTERCOMMUNICATIONSUBJECT
message.locale: New statement letter.

message.name: ERR_STATEMENT_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: At least one participant should be selected to create a statement.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_MODIFYCASESTATUSINVALID
message.locale: Can only modify an open, active or approved hearing case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPROVEDRECEIPTMETHODMODIFIED
message.locale: Cannot modify receipt method for an approved hearing case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPROVEDEFFECTIVEDATEMODIFIED
message.locale: Cannot modify effective date for an approved hearing case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_APPROVEDRECEIVEDATEMODIFIED
message.locale: Cannot modify receipt date for an approved hearing case.

message.name: INF_APPEAL_FV_APPEALCASEDEADLINECHANGED
message.locale: Appeal case resolution deadline has changed.

message.name: INF_APPEAL_FV_BENEFITSCONTINUEDINDICATORCHANGED
message.locale: Benefits continued indicator has changed.

message.name: INF_APPEAL_ORGANIZATION
message.locale: Organization
Organisation

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_RECEIVEDDATE
message.locale: The date received must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XFV_DATERECEIVED_BEFORE_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: The date received must not be before the effective date.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_DATERECEIVED_BEFORE_REGISTRATIONDATE
message.locale: The date received must not be before the registration date of the appealed case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_DATERECEIVED_BEFORE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The date received must not be before the end date of the appealed case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: The effective date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_BEFOREREGDATE
message.locale: The effective date must not be before the registration date of the appealed case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_JUDICIALREVIEWMODIFYCASESTATUSINVALID
message.locale: Can only modify an active judicial review case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DIFFICULTYCODE
message.locale: The difficulty for the appeal case must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_INTEGRATEDCASE
message.locale: An appeal cannot be created for an integrated case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_APPEALCASE
message.locale: The case to appeal cannot be an appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_PRIORCASE
message.locale: The prior appeal case must be an appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_ACTIVECASE
message.locale: An active appeal already exists for the appealed case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_ACTIVEASSESSMENTS
message.locale: Cannot appeal a product delivery when an assessment for the product delivery is already being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_ACTIVEAAPPEALSONPDFORASSESSMENTS
message.locale: Cannot appeal an assessment delivery when there is an active appeal for its product delivery.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_BENEFITSINDICATOR
message.locale: The continue benefits selection must be the same as all other active appeals related to the case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: An appeal must be associated with a registered participant.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_PARTICIPANT_INVALID
message.locale: The participant must be a participant from the case being appealed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_PARTICIPANT_INVALID
message.locale: Must be a participant from the appealed case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_NOCASE
message.locale: An implementation case to appeal must be provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_NOAPPEALCASE
message.locale: An appeal case must be provided.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_WRONGTYPE
message.locale: Can only add an appealed case to an appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_CLOSED
message.locale: Cannot add an appealed case to a closed appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_PRIORNOTCLOSED
message.locale: The prior appeal case must be closed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_PRIORNOTAPPEAL
message.locale: The prior appeal case must be an appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_DEADLINEBEFORESCHEDULED
message.locale: Cannot add case to appeal as deadline is before the scheduled hearing for the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_APPEALNOTCLOSED
message.locale: Cannot add an appeal case unless it is closed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_APPELLANTISORGANIZATION
message.locale: A receipt notice cannot be created when the appellant is the organization.
A receipt notice cannot be created when the appellant is the organisation.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XFV_APPEALTYPE_NOTALLOWED
message.locale: This type of appeal is not allowed at this stage.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_RNFE_APPEALTYPE_NOTDEFINED
message.locale: There are no further levels of appeal for this product.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_INVALIDUSERASSIGNMENT
message.locale: A task cannot have more than one assigned user.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_APPELLANT_RESPONDENT_INVALID
message.locale: The appellant and respondent must be the same for all appealed cases.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_INVALID_OBJECT_DETAILS
message.locale: Invalid object format.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_OBJECT_MISSING
message.locale: An item must be selected for the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_OBJECT_PREVIOUS_STAGE_NOT_COMPLETE
message.locale: This type of appeal is not valid for the %1c item because a previous appeal stage must have first been completed.
